role: Sr. Technical Support Engineer, Focused Services.
description: I provide technical support to customers and partners, offering configurations, troubleshooting, and best practices. I manage support cases, ensure timely resolution, and conduct fault isolation and root cause analysis. I publish technical documentation, review training materials, and provide on-call support when necessary.

Single point of contact for several Argentina customers like ICBC and HSBC private banks for anything concerning their Teradata systems. I field all questions, concerns and needs for the DBA team where it concerns their extensive systems. My position includes project management of complex software role-outs, incident management, maintaining the hardware of Teradata systems and assisting my local Teradata team in supporting the rest of customers as well.

Provide technical assistance to customers'​ inquiries relating to technical issues with software, online or electronic products where a variety of issues that are more complex and/or specialized in scope apply. This includes keeping a clear and active focus on inquiry resolution and ensuring that all the necessary action is taken to resolve a customer's inquiry.
